about.name: Adhiraj Jain
about.aboutme: Hi, My name is Adhiraj Jain and I am a software Developer

work.summary: Solving 300+ doubts monthly based on Data Structures and Algorithms and evaluation of projects.
Solving 300+ doubts monthly based on Data Structures and Algorithms and evaluation of projects.
Managing and organizing Tech-based inter- school competition events. Leading a team of professionals from various departments such as financial, logistics, developers etc.

awards.name: Excellence in On The Spot International Photography Contest

Bookeroo E-commerce Web App.summary: Followed and experienced Test Driven Development and agile style of development. Integrated PayPal API for checkout. Implemented Advanced UI Patterns.
Bookeroo E-commerce Web App.tools: React, Spring boot, AWS Amplify, AWS Beanstalk, CircleCI (CI/CD), GitHub, Docker.
Bookeroo E-commerce Web App.aim: Aim of this project is to make an ecommerce web application for books.

Qwirkle: A Board Game.summary: Implemented complex software algorithms with immense use of Data Structures and algorithms. Implemented test cases to ensure game works fine in normal and edge case scenarios. Used various software design and development strategies.
Qwirkle: A Board Game.aim: Implemented a multiple player board game using Object Oriented programming.

E-commerce Web Application.summary: Developed a full stack web application using agile style of methodologies. Integrated SendGrid emailing system into the application for various emailing functionalities.
E-commerce Web Application.tools: Ruby on Rails, AWS cloud9 IDE, Heroku
E-commerce Web Application.aim: The aim of this project is to make an e-commerce web application.

Black Jack: A Card Game.summary: It has been built with extensive use of skills such as Data structures, AWT/Swing.
Black Jack: A Card Game.aim: Purpose of this project is to build a black jack game engine and its AWT/Swing Graphical user Interface.

Instagram Bot.summary: The bot can extract information about someone's profile including followers, post information etc. The bot can search over the website, can like or comment someone's post. It can also see a userâ€™s story. It can find profiles with top followers and can Follow/Unfollow a user. Mathematical operations performed like finding mean, median etc.
Instagram Bot.tools: Beautiful Soup, Selenium, NumPy and pandas.
Instagram Bot.aim: Purpose of project is to scrap data from Instagram web using algorithms.

FitBuddy: A Fitness Application.summary: Built this prototype as an assignment work during course program. Different User Interface patterns have been taken into consideration to make it more effective and interactive.
FitBuddy: A Fitness Application.aim: Purpose of this project is to build a prototype of a fitness application which show users what exercises to do and explain exactly how to do them.
